ai-iti62:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti62:2.3_0: The faculty of understanding that one’s enlightenment is imminent, the faculty of enlightenment, and the faculty of one who is enlightened.
ai-iti62:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti62:3.4_0: enlightenment follows in the same lifetime.
ai-iti62:4.2_0: to such a one, freed through enlightenment,
ai-iti62:5.2_0: peaceful, in love with the state of peace,
ai-iti62:6.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
